summary: A utility script that converts K‑diffusion upscaler checkpoints into a Diffusers‑compatible UNet model by remapping resnet, self‑attention and cross‑attention layers and saving the result to a Hugging Face repository.
business_intent: Allow developers to reuse existing K‑diffusion upscaler models within the Hugging Face Diffusers ecosystem, simplifying deployment and integration of these models for image generation pipelines.
